text: Will we have many physics talk at the JuliaCon? What do you submit (a talk, light, or an experience)?

elements.text: Will we have many physics talk at the JuliaCon? What do you submit (a talk, light, or an experience)?

text: Based on last they there should be a bunch, mostly lightning talks and posters (iirc)

elements.text: Based on last they there should be a bunch, mostly lightning talks and posters (iirc)

text: Just remember that talks should be focused on the Julia aspect, not the physics aspect, and how Julia enables better simulations or whatever. And it should be aimed at the widest possible audience

elements.text: Just remember that talks should be focused on the Julia aspect, not the physics aspect, and how Julia enables better simulations or whatever. And it should be aimed at the widest possible audience
